review: I already have an Apple TV and a chromecast. I have to say the Fire TV Stick was easier to set up than either of the others. I also love how easy it is to rent a movie on the spot and how much easier it is to play than an itunes movie rented ove Apple TV. So far so good and I am considering buying another.

review: The Fire Stick itself works fine, but there is one problem.  When I am not watching Prime and watching normal channels on Direct, my TV screen goes black for a few moments every few minutes.  The only way to stop this from happening is to unplug the Fire Stick every time we are done watching a Prime video.  This doesn't appear to be a big problem, except the TV it's plugged into is eight feet from the floor.  I don't want to have to go through that scenario every time.  I will be glad to change my rating when this problem is solved.
author: J. McDonough
